alert.note: Alert for Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 5:23PM CST until January 01 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR EASTERN OKTIBBEHA COUNTY... At 522 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sessums, or near Starkville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Oktibbeha County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
